thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 4 of 278
thread.title: Robert & Kelly Knudsen
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Robert & Kelly Knudsen

author: Robert & Kelly Knudsen
title: Robert & Kelly Knudsen
text: Form start to finish quicken loan made our experience easy and their website was user friendly and if you had any questions you never had to wait for an answer because they were a phone call away and we never had to wait for someone to answer we always got to talk to someone in only a few minutes, we will always use quicken loans for our mortgage and refinance needs they will mean or beat anyone out there for your mortgage and refinance needs,this was the second time we have used them and we are referring them to other people that we know who are thinking about a mortgage or refinance loan they are a company that you can trust and that is hard to find out there
